stops.address: Peloton c/o XPO Logistics, 4530 Steelway Blvd South Liverpool, NY 13090

clauses_found.danger_simple_language: If you add other freight to this truck, you will be fined 100% of the rate.
clauses_found.original_text: If the carrier partials any of our shipments, you will be fined 100% of the agreed-upon rate.
Carrier agrees to a 25% late fee (minimum $200 late fee) should driver arrive late to delivery.

notification.title: Delivery Deadline
notification.description: Must deliver by scheduled time to avoid 25% fine.

clauses_found.danger_simple_language: You must text or email 30 minutes BEFORE detention starts or you won't get paid.
clauses_found.original_text: Carriers must notify Transfix by emailing carriersuccess@transfix.io or by having driver text in 30 minutes before detention starts in order to be eligible for detention payout.

notification.title: Detention Notice
notification.description: Notify broker 30 mins before detention starts.

driver_dispatch_view.pickup_instructions: DRIVER MUST HAVE STRAPS OR LOAD BARS. 53' DRY VAN WITH SWING DOORS ONLY.

transit_requirements_en: 53' Dry Van with Swing Doors only
transit_requirements_punjabi: Transfix ਐਪ ਰਾਹੀਂ ਟਰੈਕਿੰਗ ਜ਼ਰੂਰੀ ਹੈ
ਸਿਰਫ਼ ਸਵਿੰਗ ਦਰਵਾਜ਼ਿਆਂ ਵਾਲੀ 53' ਡਰਾਈ ਵੈਨ
ਕਿਸੇ ਹੋਰ ਦਾ ਮਾਲ ਲੋਡ ਕਰਨ ਦੀ ਇਜਾਜ਼ਤ ਨਹੀਂ ਹੈ

driver_dispatch_instructions.description_en: 53' Dry Van with Swing Doors and Straps required.
driver_dispatch_instructions.description_punjabi: ਸਵਿੰਗ ਦਰਵਾਜ਼ੇ ਅਤੇ ਸਟ੍ਰੈਪ ਵਾਲੀ 53' ਡਰਾਈ ਵੈਨ ਚਾਹੀਦੀ ਹੈ।

driver_dispatch_instructions.description_en: Activate Transfix app tracking before heading to pickup.
